name: Diaa El-din Atya
title: Python Developer & Tech Content Creator
summary: Tech enthusiast with a deep interest in Python, data analysis, and reverse engineering. I run the YouTube channel 'Code with D' where I create engaging programming tutorials and educational content aimed at beginners and aspiring developers.

experience.description: Creating educational video content on Python programming, data analysis, and tech tutorials in Arabic. Focus on beginner-friendly explanations, AI integration, and making coding fun and engaging.

Working on web development projects using Express, React, Sequelize, and SQLite. Created a personal portfolio with blog/project management, authentication, and an admin panel. Developed educational and AI-powered tools.

education.description: Completed multiple online courses in Python, data analysis, web development, and operating systems (including 'Operating Systems: Three Easy Pieces').

projects.name: CodewithD Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio with dark theme, JWT-protected admin panel, project/blog management, and hosted on Google Cloud.

projects.name: M.C.P (Model Context Protocol)
projects.description: Python SDK tool that allows LLMs like Claude Desktop to create and read CSV files, enabling them to answer questions based on structured data.

projects.name: Remotique Store Integration
projects.description: Worked on Shopify product data integration for generating automatic price lists and quotations in Odoo.
